summary: A collection of unit tests that validate the behavior of the PAV backend component in the Annif indexing framework, covering its default configuration, initialization, training state, modification timestamps, suggestion generation, training process, caching mechanisms, and handling of edge cases such as empty document sets.
business_intent: To guarantee the reliability and correctness of the PAV backend for automated subject indexing, ensuring it meets expected functionality and integrates smoothly within the Annif system.
